channel.title: When will we be able to pre-order BM on Steam?
channel.description:
Hey everyone,
First of all, this isn't a "when will it be released" or anything question, so please don't burn this thread to the ground :smiley: I was just wondering, when will we be albe to pre-order the Steam release of BM on Steam? I don't care if it will take another year or two to be released after it would be released on Steam for pre-order, I just want to pre-order it so I can just wait untill the mod get's released on Steam without having to spend money a couple of days before the release. I'm sure the devs would appriciate the money at this stage.
Anyway, thank you so much for the mod, it's just a piece of art, and I'm patiently waiting for Multiplayer and Xen.

item.title: When will we be able to pre-order BM on Steam?

item.description:
Hey everyone,

First of all, this isn’t a “when will it be released” or anything question, so please don’t burn this thread to the ground
I was just wondering, when will we be albe to pre-order the Steam release of BM on Steam? I don’t care if it will take another year or two to be released after it would be released on Steam for pre-order, I just want to pre-order it so I can just wait untill the mod get’s released on Steam without having to spend money a couple of days before the release. I’m sure the devs would appriciate the money at this stage.

Anyway, thank you so much for the mod, it’s just a piece of art, and I’m patiently waiting for Multiplayer and Xen.
